title: AE脚本-像素拖尾拉伸效果 Stretch-it v2.1
author: 大众脸
content: 该脚本可以将文字或图层过度拉伸缩放，通过简单操作即可制作出效果。脚本适用于Win/Mac系统，支持AE CC 2018、CC 2019。

other.script_introduction_en: I created this tool because I’ve always liked the contrast between overstretched and condensed letters in a single word. But making the effect was time-consuming and tedious, then if I changed my mind on the chosen letter, the word itself, or the font, I simply had to start from the beginning. https://aescripts.com/stretch-it/
